website_summaries.verdict: Head on back to the early '80s with a Casio calculator watch. The classic design is as functional now as it was when Casio started selling calculator watches decades ago.
pros: The functional calculator is very handy, as are the five alarms
You can even store 25 phone numbers with it (or other pieces of numerical data)
Oh, and there's no extra charge for the nostalgia
cons: Buttons are a bit small and the same is true of the display
The band will tug at arm hairs and the design is of the "love it or hate" it variety
This watch is not shockproof or waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I swapped the band for added coolness to get more chicks.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Hot little number (cruncher)
customer_reviews.text: Love the ridiculously expensive look. When strangers notice it, they typically assume I'm a legendary rapper. They're surprised to find out I'm a modestly successful mid-level sales manager. Never fails to give me the upper hand in heated negotiations. You know the old adage - "He who speaks first, (or can't crunch tiny numbers on his gold calculator watch) loses !" Only con is that its not waterproof so I have to remember to take it off every time a group of strangers invite me to join them in the hot tub. Also it turns out its not real gold :(
customer_reviews.author: boots

customer_reviews.title: major flex
customer_reviews.text: really good quality, so many different features, it is really the best looking gold watch out there i would take this over a rolex because this is more of a flex imo btw be careful when you’re doing outdoor activities in it though because that little clip thing that holds it on popped open when i was parkouring and fell 20 feet onto the ground, but as you can see from the pics there weren’t any scratches so it’s durable
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hardisty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch for the ladies, too!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Casio watches and have practically worn out my Baby g shock. Needed a change and wanted something different. Love this watch. It's comfortable, easy to adjust and stylish. The price was great, too. My only warning be careful with your hair getting too close to the watch, it'll get caught and stuck. My daughter lost a few strands while I brushed it. Other than that, excellent watch if you're looking for something simple. I personally don't want another device to be attached to.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite of the watches I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: What a looker! I'm a big fan of the fit and finish of this watch and have received many compliments to the credit of this piece. While I must admit that I seldom use the majority of the features that this watch has to offer, the keypad and screen have continued to hold up well over the past year of intermittent use during semi-daily wear. Aesthetics aside, my favorite feature is the wrist strap's fitment range and ease of adjustment. Being one with smaller than average wrists, I'm pleased to find that this watch is capable of fitting to my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kole

customer_reviews.title: Works in Costa Rica too!
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful woman I have ever seen or could even imagine made love with me immediately after putting this watch on for the first time, during a recent vacation in Costa Rica!
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Ripley

customer_reviews.title: The C3PO of watches
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of the calculator watches from Casio since watching "Back to The Future" as a kid. Worn the CA53W for years until it got magnetized and stopped working, so instead of getting another I decided to upgrade to this. My work requires wearing a suit so I thought it would match better and so far I've been getting lots of compliments on it. It's a tad tacky looking but catches everybody's attention, which makes it a good conversation starter too!
customer_reviews.author: Tai  Co

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent watch. It is light, multifunctional, and elegant. It suits well to wear in the office. The display is of golden color that matches the rest of the watch. It is easy to setup if one downloads the manual. The digits on the display are large enough to read without too much effort. I wish this watch had display illumination similar to Casio Royale. The existing display illumination will let you see the first two or three digits only. Improved illumination would make it an ideal watch for business travel.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriy Kozmenko

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch But Could Be Heavier
customer_reviews.text: Overall the watch is not as heavy as I expected. The band is definitely metal, but the links are a bit thin. There is an included manual (in English) and setting the time is pretty simple. To adjust the band width on your wrist there is a Youtube video I watched. Google "How to adjust Casio Calculator Watch Strap". The watch feels a bit cheap in my opinion and that it could break easily (at least the band). Really the only thing I would change is make the band thicker and heavier. Note: The watch face is plastic. Based on researched this watch is sold in Asia markets but imported I believe.
customer_reviews.author: jetsit

customer_reviews.title: The Ladies Love it
customer_reviews.text: Now I can calculate my $5 bitcoin investment in style. Gold paint fades nicely with age if your into that.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoUser

customer_reviews.title: When you look at d Moon n want it... evenutally you get d Baboon😂😂😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.text: Am very shocked by the size of the watch.. totally disappointed by d look of it... feautues r good. The belt is very flimzy keeps opening every now n den..d a watch falls on d floor.. ITS SO TRUE WILL ONLINE PRODUCT PRESENTATION & PICS R GREATLY ADVERTISED... BUT WHEN D PRODUCT REACHES D CUSTOMER ITS APRIL FOOL A TOTAL SURPRISE... SO WAT ELR U GOING TO DO ABOUT IT.. am going highlight this on social media too. All the very best
customer_reviews.author: Nazareth Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s honestly a great looking watch not really to comfortable at the wrist but that’s probly cause I just have it adjusted alittle tight and honestly I do like it it’s just that I don’t really think it’s worth more the 40 bucks but it is a great stylish piece
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice eye catcher
customer_reviews.text: I was wearing it and my girlfriend's dad seen it. We started talking and he was saying how he had the same one back in the day, I told him I had I cheaper one with the plastic or rubber strap on and how I always said I will get this one when I was older. Long story short I took it off and gave it him. I can get another later.
customer_reviews.author: Ohcan23

customer_reviews.title: great style for a classic watch
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one when I was a kid. Loved it However the display only goes to 6 digits, you can't put in a 7 digit phone number. Back in the day when we only had one area code you could remember what it was even it was for long distance. now you have to augment the number in the display. If you are cool with that, this is a great little watch
customer_reviews.author: T. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This watch ruined Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: CHRISTMAS RUINED. Band is cheap, flimsy, and completely not durable. Clasp doesn’t hold. Own multiple watches from a basic $30 Timex Indy, another Casio pushbutton calculator on base plastic strap, to the new Rolex 41 Datejust. This gold calculator watch was unfortunately the Christmas unmiracle. Nice case, but the rest can be bought at a five and some store Inexplicable that thing is rated so highly which is what I was going off of.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Calculating on the go... in style!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasteful, understated wristwatch. While it is the much more opulent golden color, it definitely doesn't look garish. Keeps time and calculates accurately. People keep asking me for financial advice ever since I've been wearing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wanna count stacks in style, buy this watch.
customer_reviews.text: Do you want it instantly be transported to 1988 well this is the watch for you. With style and function abound this Casio watch is going to be the only watch you need. Need to do some calculations while scuba diving? Need to jot down the license plate of a hit-and-run driver? This watch can really do it all. And you can look smooth doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works As Intended, Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have never gotten more compliments / comments on an article of clothing or accessory. Not exactly the reason you purchase something, but it's still nice. This product works great. Only downsides are that it is not waterproof, meaning you gotta take it off to wash your hands, and that the buttons are quite difficult to press individually. But hey, I don't ever really press them, it's more for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: expensive watches are for chumps
customer_reviews.text: The manual is as thick as the one for my car, but I expect that it has as many features too. It is incredibly difficult to master any features except changing the time and of course doing some math, but who cares when you look so much better than everyone else at the mathlete. This watch is a classic and dare I say timeless. you could blow $50 on a night out or get this watch and let everyone fight to buy your rounds so they too can bask in the warm, golden glory you shine upon all that surround you.
customer_reviews.author: manda pandamonium

customer_reviews.title: Casio Calculator Watch >>> Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: When I finished middle-school, my parents bought me a gigantic Swiss watch that I loved and wore all the time and thought was so cool. I still have it but don’t wear it as often. In the 3 weeks I’ve had this watch I’ve gotten more compliments on it than I received on my other watch in years. This thing is a blast from the past and just has that 80’s cool guy kind of feel to it. The functionality of it is a total gimmick as is the case for pretty much every calculator watch, but believe me, this thing will turn heads. If you’re on the fence, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton M.

customer_reviews.title: I just wanna go flex
customer_reviews.text: The ladies ... they just won't get off. When I flex this watch, they come running. Not only do they know I got swag, they know I've got those basic calculations on point. Not to mention I can snag their number and save it on this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Retro-chic
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, a blast from the past and still looks really cool. A precursor to the iPhones and apple watches of today. It has Nice functions, I just wish that the light feature would light up the screen more evenly rather than mostly on one side of it. You'd think they'd perfected that by now.
customer_reviews.author: MIKEVF25

customer_reviews.title: Keeps great time and helps me make life changing calculations as ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch because..well you don't really need an answer.. its a calculator watch! stylish, Tech savvy and everyone will notice its a Casio! If you want to make life easier then get this watch. If you want to take your dating life to the next level then get this watch. If you want to take your life to the next level, get this watch! Keeps great time and helps me make life changing calculations as well as storing important top secret phone numbers. My Apple Watch has taken the back seat for awhile as this is the front runner.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Drops about 2 seconds a week. Wouldn't wash the dishes with it, I think it would stop instantly if it fell in.

customer_reviews.title: Hate it. Returning it.
customer_reviews.text: Picture may not be a good representation of the product. The band on this watch is smaller than small (thin) - not sure if this is consistent with the original design and I am simple a victim of modern watch styling,but there is no way I could wear this watch. Looks like I stole it from a kid.

customer_reviews.title: Such a conversation piece

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetic and Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I get so many comments on this watch. "Cool watch man!" and "Where'd you get that sweet watch yo?" "Dude! is that a calculator watch?". The functionality is great too, it's more than an accessory. It's a great time keeper, stopwatch, and I actually use the calculator sometimes. It isn't too hard to press the buttons either. Read the manual, there are a lot of neat functions!

customer_reviews.title: Does everything your cell phone does, but your cell phone makes you look like a tool.
customer_reviews.text: 1. It's gold. Do you know what the street value of gold is?? 2. It's a real Casio. Not some stupid crap made in China, or Asia or something. 3. It does math. Like really quick, too. 4. It has a real LED light to guide you through the perils of the night. 5. Rolex, Patek Phillipe and Audemars Piguet don't make calculator watches. (They are so dumb.) Are you still reading this?

An i wished the straps were a bit wider, they seem a bit narrow. I'm 6'2 220lbs so I have a bigger build and bigger wrist...maybe that's why they look small lol.

customer_reviews.title: Child of the 90's Product of the 80's
customer_reviews.text: Watch arrived in full retail packaging, with all necessary paperwork. Watch I received was authentic and the color is excellent. I wear it with everything and have been getting compliments on it, which is always a plus. Very comfortable once fitted to wrist, which is done very easily by a little clasp. Looking forward to wearing this for years to come.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shiny, pretty light. Band feels good. A little smaller than I expected and I didn’t know if the buttons would be hard to operate but it seems to work just fine. Controls are a little confusing at first.

customer_reviews.title: All the cool kids wear them these days

Totally brings me back to when I was in elementary school, being so jealous of all the others kids who had a watch like this. Watch out, your coolness factor just increased a gazillion points.

customer_reviews.title: This is quite fun. It's a bit small and doesn't feel like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is quite fun. It's a bit small and doesn't feel like a real quality piece, but it's just so much fun. I plan to wear it on days when I don't want to take anything--myself, the world, life--too seriously. I'm glad I got it! Don't pay over $50 for it though.

customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day I wore it. The “stainless steel” body broke right where the band connects and was irreparably damaged. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Evan A. Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: The Watch is great!
customer_reviews.text: the watch is great. It is beyond my imagination. I like watches to do multiples things. It does more than I imagine. I thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Upton

customer_reviews.title: Conversation Starter
customer_reviews.text: It's a gold calculator watch. Everything awesome about it is self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retro cool.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this watch! The gold is more muted than it looks, almost a matt gold, which makes it look very retro and trendy without too much bling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend he definitely was extremely happy with it its the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is true to picture it came in the Casio box and holder. What was even better was I have the users guide I'm so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
